= quality( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match an items quality

== Arguments ==

 * arg1..N = quality to match (numeric or string)

== Remarks ==
  * 0 = Poor (grey)
  * 1 = Common (white)
  * 2 = Uncommon (green)
  * 3 = Rare (blue)
  * 4 = Epic (purple)
  * 5 = Legendary (orange)
  * 6 = Artifact (red)

  * you can use either the numeric value or the text value as an argument

== Examples ==

`quality( poor )`

`quality( 5, 6 )`
